a355f640-b3df-4b86-9708-16f06eb69378: All Besmaran pirates gain a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} for every 5 of their Besmaran pirate comrades you have killed (on this island or any other). This bonus stacks up to a maximum of +10.
d1561935-7917-4bfc-810d-da3e93c0fe88: All Besmaran pirates gain a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} for every 5 of their comrades you have killed (on this island or any other). This bonus stacks up to a maximum of +25.
b06eb6f3-7ea1-4885-b250-c496ce47b1db: All {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} dealt by your party members is increased by 25%.
4ceeda4c-be7b-4969-b60b-70ceb2ba877b: All {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} done with positive energy within the area of effect is reduced by 50%.
ef712f37-ae2d-46ea-86a6-422aead09679: Each elf in your party gains a +1 initiative bonus per level
87151fe8-75bf-457f-bdc0-644d9eba11f3: Each stack increased DC of FORT by 1
e158d9c7-ba9d-42cc-9146-9c701fcfcce0: Every time a cannibal devours a corpse, they go into a rage similar to a barbarian's rage and gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good{/g}.
f32feba9-f747-4cfa-96e6-2c2a94f43647: Every time a creature casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, if the creature does not have {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire (including temporary immunity granted by effects such as a {g|SpellsProtectionFromEnergy}protection from energy{/g} spell), it takes {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} (the damage amount is based on the island's challenge rating).
d979f807-3dfc-4bff-9e4b-4fb903924b1d: Every time this creature hits with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating) or become infected with anemia.
6222a46a-8fe9-42b5-8f3f-d3a2ff0634bd: Every time you affect a party member with a divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you also give them a luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, equal to the spell's level, for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
e4ce72ed-5f28-4e9e-b880-5db04b7db29b: Every time you affect a party member with a divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you also give them a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, equal to the spell's level, for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
03b17623-4cc2-40e3-bf39-554e06193eb1: Every time you affect a party member with a divine {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you also give them a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, equal to the spell's level, for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
fdc70ea1-8c00-49b2-8f5b-a3943214d9ed: If your {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g} matches chaotic neutral along one axis only, you gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
3a192e31-ec63-4f2d-9ee1-e19961d309aa:
The affected creature becomes more poised, articulate, personally forceful and smart. The effect grants the subject a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
6d51ed43-be1c-468e-83d4-890692d01d0d:
The affected creature becomes more poised, articulate, personally forceful and wise. The effect grants the subject a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
c04bc05a-1b2b-4b62-b3cc-58915b425e50:
The affected creature becomes more smart and wise. The effect grants the subject a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
63fc215d-f622-4a87-b95b-8130492432ea:
The affected creature becomes more strong, graceful, agile and coordinated. The effect grants the subject a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
440b18a1-5d22-4814-ae8c-23087bd6859b:
The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina, and also becomes more graceful, agile and coordinated. The effect grants the subject a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
f34da7d2-5840-4d81-8c97-30d3f7607cdd:
The affected creature gains greater vitality and stamina, and also becomes stronger. The effect grants the subject a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
d3c5bfa8-09a3-4fd7-928b-35e72957122f:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the protection from sound {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain temporary immunity to sound. When the effect absorbs 12 points per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is dispelled. Additionally, as long as this effect is active, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 1 (stacks with other caster level increasing effects).
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus types{/g}, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
07660172-1931-4505-a228-26c9497439d3:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the true seeing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain the ability to see all things as they actually are. They see the exact locations of creatures or objects under {g|SpellsBlur}blur{/g} or {g|SpellsDisplacement}displacement{/g} effects, see invisible creatures normally. They also gain a +5 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
c47a43fb-4617-4bbf-82d1-8d1909254acb:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsBearsEndurance}bear's endurance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, which adds the usual benefits to {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saves{/g}, Constitution {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, and so forth.
This effect persists until the you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
9951de10-5a3d-4ecf-9a0a-bc4a448a99d9:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsBlur}blur{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} (20% miss chance). They also gain a +1 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
5e9867c7-e462-4aed-bf90-b3b4e4ff946b:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsBullsStrength}bull's strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, adding the usual benefits to {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and other uses of the Strength modifier.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
2acde08f-8ef6-4009-955f-fbddbe6b4f41:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsCatsGrace}cat's grace{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, adding the usual benefits to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saves{/g}, and other uses of the Dexterity modifier.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
8969a45a-f008-4af5-923d-2a0435028de8:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsDivinePower}divine power{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +1 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, and Strength-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} for every three {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character levels{/g} they have (maximum +6). They also gain 1 temporary hit point per character level (these temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} stack with the ones gained from any other sources). Whenever they make a full attack, they can make an additional attack at their full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}, plus any appropriate modifiers. This additional attack is cumulative with similar effects, such as {g|SpellsHaste}haste{/g} or weapons with the speed special ability.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
31e0d684-9254-4ae7-b336-1b9467786f5b:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsEaglesSplendor}eagle's splendor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, adding the usual benefits to Charisma-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} and other uses of the Charisma modifier. Bards, paladins, and sorcerers (and other spellcasters who rely on Charisma) affected by this effect do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Charisma, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} for spells they cast while under this effect do increase.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
2939d315-bb41-4c9c-9a9d-853755fa3096:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsEaglesoul}eaglesoul{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +2 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, a +4 expedition bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 5 to acid and fire, a +5 expedition bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion checks{/g} made to intimidate {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} creatures, a +2 expedition bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} 2. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} threat {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} made against an evil creature with a weapon they wield is automatically confirmed.
This effect can only be applied to good-aligned characters. It immediately dispels from any nongood characters.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
c6626795-c65b-4e83-840a-65570492d412:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsEcholocation}echolocation{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain blindsight to a range of 50 feet and a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port.
122de952-c639-41af-9103-85893b84657f:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsFoxsCunning}fox's cunning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, adding the usual benefits to Intelligence-based {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} and other uses of the Intelligence modifier. Wizards and other spellcasters who rely on Intelligence affected by this effect do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Intelligence, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} for spells they cast while under this effect do increase. This spell doesn't grant extra skill ranks.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
edd2548b-a954-480e-9f3b-7dcece3abbd2:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsFreedomOfMovement}freedom of movement{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain the ability to move and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} normally, even under the influence of magic that usually impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, {g|SpellsSlow}slow{/g}, and {g|SpellsWeb}web{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to grapple them automatically fail. They also gain a +2 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
61d583a7-1071-41bd-bc0a-4ee10d86424b:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsGoodHope}good hope{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +2 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
58f3ee86-dbe9-4eea-8b0f-7bcfc7a88c81:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsGreaterHeroism}greater heroism{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, immunity to fear effects, and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} (maximum 20). These temporary hit points stack with the ones gained from any other sources.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
57257e7a-7da0-4ddf-a463-dcf1e14f80f3:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsHeroism}heroism{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +2 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. They also gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} (maximum 20). These temporary hit points stack with the ones gained from any other sources.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
3d85d101-68fa-4325-99fc-f46289950bc3:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsLegendaryProportions}legendary proportions{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain grows to legendary proportions, increasing in {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} by two categories. Their height doubles and their weight increases by a factor of 12. They gain a +6 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and a +4 expedition bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} ability score. They gain a +6 expedition bonus to their natural armor, and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/adamantine. Melee and ranged weapons used by them deal more {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
da22f77d-4d60-4592-a23a-b8efc3f9be5e:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsMageArmor}mage armor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
69bf0850-6018-4393-8cd9-f582dd0e8b3e:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsMindBlank}mind blank{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +8 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against all mind-affecting spells and effects. They are also protected from all items, spells, and other effects that gather information about the target through divination magic (such as {g|SpellsThoughtsense}thoughtsense{/g}, {g|SpellsTrueSeeing}true seeing{/g}, and {g|SpellsSeeInvisibility}see invisibility{/g}). Additionally, they gain a +10 expedition bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
3f25f386-16f3-4e0d-8d98-aa078c21abbc:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsOwlsWisdom}owl's wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}, adding the usual benefit to Wisdom-related {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. Clerics, druids, rangers, and other Wisdom-based spellcasters who receive this effect do not gain any additional bonus spells for the increased Wisdom, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} for their spells increase.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
c19cb200-7b6c-4e34-a4ef-3a067067db58:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsProtectionFromCold}protection from cold{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold. When the effect absorbs 12 points per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is dispelled. Additionally, as long as this effect is active, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 1 (stacks with other caster level increasing effects).
This effect persists until you return to the port.
d1db2e04-10f0-471c-a4c5-457a8e713795:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsProtectionFromElectricity}protection from electricity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity. When the effect absorbs 12 points per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is dispelled. Additionally, as long as this effect is active, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 1 (stacks with other caster level increasing effects).
This effect persists until you return to the port.
3aeda299-2c86-4f06-a20e-2f1a1612545f:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsProtectionFromFire}protection from fire{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire. When the effect absorbs 12 points per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is dispelled. Additionally, as long as this effect is active, the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} is increased by 1 (stacks with other caster level increasing effects).
This effect persists until you return to the port.
3f58fffc-e970-4716-a489-376c54687422:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsSeeInvisibility}see invisibility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain the ability to see any objects or beings that are invisible within their range of vision. They also gain a +1 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
30e668cc-b3d8-4de3-ae12-94c765692717:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsSenseVitals}sense vitals{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain the ability to make sneak attacks, as per the rogue ability of the same name, dealing an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. This additional damage increases by 1d6 for every 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character levels{/g} you possess beyond 3rd, to a maximum of +5d6 at 15th level. This additional damage stacks with other sources of precision damage.
This effect persists until you return to the port.
2685a833-2560-47cb-bf21-1295bb809d24:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsShieldOfFaith}shield of faith{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +2 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, with an additional +1 to the bonus for every six {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character levels{/g} they have (maximum +5 bonus at 18th level).
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
c91545d7-ab4d-415e-a35d-2a4493b4f61c:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsStoneskin}stoneskin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/adamantine, which means they ignore the first 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each time they take damage from a weapon, though an adamantine weapon overcomes the reduction. Once the effect has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} (maximum 150 points), it is dispelled. It also gives the character 50 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. These temporary hit points stack with the ones gained from any other sources.
This effect persists until you return to the port.
d8335606-f133-47f3-b967-d423859bce70:
The character is affected by an effect akin to the {g|SpellsTransformation}transformation{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. They gain a +4 expedition {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}, a +4 expedition bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, a +5 expedition bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saves{/g}, and proficiency with all simple and {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}martial weapons{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} equals their {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} (which may give them multiple {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}).
This effect persists until you return to the port. Unlike most bonus types, multiple expedition bonuses stack.
686c58e1-1b5c-46f7-bf3f-1c55f2c8f6fc: The floor is lava! Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} it deals everyone standing there {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}20d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} halves).
afc2de8c-a97a-4be0-8e69-eca8593dd854: The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} cast by this creature is reduced by 1 for every stack of this effect. It effect can be removed by a {g|SpellsRestoration}restoration{/g} spell.

d57ebaca-8180-47b2-b102-417e04ceb022: This creature gains a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} for every 5 of its Besmaran pirate comrades you have killed (on this island or any other). This bonus stacks up to a maximum of +25.
fca522e2-0963-499f-af6f-99b32189dd51: This creature gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and its maximum number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} is increased by 2 per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}HD{/g}. 5f499f66-800d-42c0-92d9-8fa3c5dfb7e4: This island is affected by a magical undertow flowing beneath it. 3747585d-ffff-4b02-b050-f1e61e956211: Unlike most {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus types{/g}, multiple expedition bonuses stack with each other, as well as any other bonus types.
d91b8558-372d-4bb6-bbe4-4781718b3721: When this counter reaches 6, you become middle-aged. When it reaches 11, you become old. When it reaches 16, you become venerable. c31189e0-affb-4a7e-8358-bbea39397433: Whenever this creature hits the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is based on the island's challenge rating). On a failed save, the creature affects the target with an effect that reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} cast by the target. Multiple applications of this effect stack. This effect can be removed by a {g|SpellsRestoration}restoration{/g} spell.

42a95c86-ed08-4fff-bc42-c60849e9042a: Your armor is red-hot from the heat. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}combat round{/g}, you must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is 15 in the first round and increases with each round) or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}. Creatures wearing no armor and those with {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to fire (including temporary immunity granted by effects such as a {g|SpellsProtectionFromEnergy}protection from energy{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}) are unaffected.
5c7164b3-cf0f-4b8e-a216-ea2220e12c3c: Your armor is red-hot from the heat. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}combat round{/g}, you must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} (the save {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is 20 in the first round and increases with each round) or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
